question.en: Photosynthesis only occurs in the leaves of plants.
question.bm: Fotosintesis hanya berlaku di daun tumbuhan.

explanation.en: Photosynthesis can occur in any green part of a plant that contains chlorophyll, including stems, young bark, and even some fruits. While leaves are the primary site, they are not the only location where photosynthesis takes place.
explanation.bm: Fotosintesis boleh berlaku di mana-mana bahagian hijau tumbuhan yang mengandungi klorofil, termasuk batang, kulit kayu muda, dan bahkan beberapa buah. Walaupun daun adalah tapak utama, ia bukan satu-satunya lokasi di mana fotosintesis berlaku.

hint.en: Consider other green parts of plants that might contain chlorophyll
hint.bm: Pertimbangkan bahagian hijau lain tumbuhan yang mungkin mengandungi klorofil
